analysis.description: Alohacoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/32/0xe46ddef1ea4358155c97adfd9bb20b9b5abdcb64.sol#226-234) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xe46ddef1ea4358155c97adfd9bb20b9b5abdcb64.sol:
	Contract Alohacoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xe46ddef1ea4358155c97adfd9bb20b9b5abdcb64.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0xe46ddef1ea4358155c97adfd9bb20b9b5abdcb64.sol#6-8)
